name: 8bv
command:
print('{rb}8BitVape{/} command list:')
print('{g}~8bv.mix{/}      {r}*slug*{/}     {p}Display a mix using its slug{/}')
print('{g}~8bv.find{/}     {r}*term*{/}     {p}Search mixes and display the closest result{/}')
print('{g}~8bv.search{/}   {r}*term*{/}     {p}Search mixes{/}')
print('{g}~8bv.flavour{/}  {r}*slug*{/}     {p}Display information about a flavouring{/}')
print('{g}~8bv.user{/}     {r}*username*{/} {p}Display mixes belonging to a user{/}')
print('{g}~8bv.comments{/} {r}*slug*{/}     {p}Display comments belonging to a mix{/}')
